AboutPage.title: About Aras Finder
AboutPage.missionText1: The search for a new career opportunity can be a tiring and repetitive process. Often, job platforms show vacancies that do not exactly match what we are looking for, causing us to waste time manually filtering the results.
AboutPage.missionText2: was born from the need to simplify and optimize this process. Our mission is to give professionals the tools to find the right jobs faster and smarter, using the power of technology to create searches that standard interfaces do not always allow.
AboutPage.creatorText2: a technology enthusiast passionate about creating solutions that solve real problems.

FaqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
FaqPage.a1: Yes, the tool is 100% free. The project is maintained through community support. If you find the tool useful, you can consider making a donation through the "Buy me a coffee" link in the footer.
FaqPage.q2: Why should I use Aras Finder instead of searching directly on LinkedIn/Indeed?
FaqPage.a2: Aras Finder builds much more precise search URLs than you can create manually. It uses boolean operators (like NOT and "-") to exclude unwanted terms, something the standard platform interfaces don't offer easily. This results in less "noise" and more relevant job postings.
FaqPage.a3: No. Aras Finder does not store any information about your searches. All the URL-building logic happens in your browser. Your privacy is fully respected.
FaqPage.a4: Powerful Mode adds automatic exclusions to your search (e.g., if you search for "Mid-level", it excludes "Junior" and "Internship"). It is "experimental" because, although very effective, LinkedIn's algorithm can sometimes interpret these complex searches in unexpected ways. We recommend Precise Mode for most cases.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.section1Text1: is an intelligent job search tool that deeply respects your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our service.
PrivacyPage.section1Text2: Our commitment is to provide a transparent and secure experience, ensuring that you understand exactly how your data is handled.
PrivacyPage.section2Text1: Aras Finder does NOT directly collect or store the search data (job titles, keywords, locations, etc.) you enter into our tool.
PrivacyPage.section2Text2: All the logic for building search URLs happens exclusively in your browser. Your search terms are never sent to our servers, ensuring complete confidentiality of your job searches.
PrivacyPage.section3Text1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help improve your online experience and provide useful information to site owners.
PrivacyPage.section3AnalyticsText: We use Google Analytics to analyze our site's traffic and understand how users interact with our tool. This information helps us to continuously improve the service.
PrivacyPage.section4Text1: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Here are instructions for the most popular browsers:
PrivacyPage.section4Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies and other site data
PrivacyPage.section4Firefox: Options → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data
PrivacyPage.section4Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Cookies and website data
PrivacyPage.section4NoteText: Disabling cookies may affect the functionality of some services, including ad personalization.
PrivacyPage.section5Text1: Aras Finder generates links to third-party platforms, namely:
PrivacyPage.section5Text2: When you click on these links, you are leaving our site and entering platforms with their own privacy policies. We recommend that you read the policies of these services before using them.
PrivacyPage.section6Text1: This privacy policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our privacy practices or to comply with new legal requirements.
PrivacyPage.section6Text2: When we make significant changes, we will update the "Last updated" date at the top of this page and, if necessary, notify users through our site.
PrivacyPage.section6Text3: We recommend that you review this policy regularly to stay informed about how we protect your privacy.
PrivacyPage.section7Text1: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, do not hesitate to contact us:
PrivacyPage.section7Text2: We will respond to your inquiries within 48 business hours.
PrivacyPage.footerText: Thank you for trusting Aras Finder. Your privacy is important to us.
